annotations.description: The Inside job is one of my favourite Old Fashioned variation and believe me, this is how to drink Old Fashioned! For me this is how to make the ultimate Old...
annotations.title: Old Fashioned variation - How to make the ultimate old fashioned this summer

textContent:
2 oz Bourbon
0.25 oz Maraschino
1 tea spoon Simple syrup
2 Dashes Absinth
2 Dashes Angostura bitters
Orange zest garnish

Stir and strain into rocks glass over ice

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YNiOOWHoiJ4
title: Inside Job
